author: Week 3-4 Implementation
purpose: Document channel policy changes and configurations

changes.description: Requires both BankA and BankB to endorse model registry updates
Requires both BankA and BankB to endorse federated learning contribution records
Banks can write SAR metadata independently; regulator has read-only access

notes: Endorsement policies are enforced at chaincode definition time
ACL policies are enforced at channel configuration level
Private data collections provide additional access control for SAR metadata
